name: FUN_GET_ITEM_SEG_PREFIX
body_snippet:
function FUN_GET_ITEM_SEG_PREFIX(
                                                    parm_seg_prefix_comb          varchar2, 
                                                    parm_codes_combs              varchar2,
                                                    parm_seg_sep_by               varchar2,
                                                    parm_code_sep_by              varchar2,
                                                    parm_add_sep                  varchar2 default null,
                                                    parm_struc_id                 number default null,
                                                    parm_rtn_code_seg_width       varchar2 default 'C'
                                                  ) return varchar2 is
  /****************************************************************
  ------   This function is created on 06-mar-2k4 
                      By SHAHZAD IMTIAZ
           Parameters specification:
        1. parm_seq_prefix_comb    => This parameter is for 
                                      segment combination, like
                                      1,2,3 means that Ist segment
                                      IInd segment & IIIrd segment
                                      will make the prefix code.
       2.parm_code_combs           => This parameter is for 
                                      segment code combinations, 
                                      from which code prefix will
